law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 12-506(b)(9) of this title, all housing projects of an authority are subjec...
law.text: Except as provided in § 12-506(b)(9) of this title, all housing projects of an authority are subject to the planning, zoning, sanitary, health, fire, housing, subdivision, and building laws, ordinances, codes, rules, and regulations that apply where the housing project is located.
